title: Stage Lv6-D3-S08
description: Level 6 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: Project milestones have been achieved. (professional variant 1)
Quality assurance procedures have been established. (professional variant 1)
learning_points: Level 6 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: Project milestones have been achieved. (professional variant 1)
Quality assurance procedures have been established. (professional variant 1)
The critical path has been identified. (professional variant 1)
Resource allocation has been optimized. (professional variant 1)
Consultation with stakeholders was conducted. (professional variant 1)
Quality inspections are conducted regularly. (professional variant 1)
Risk mitigation measures have been implemented. (professional variant 1)
Commissioning has been successfully completed. (professional variant 1)
Project handover proceeds as scheduled. (professional variant 1)
The warranty period has been specified. (professional variant 1)
